page.title: 18Wet wellies and a Kingfisher
page.content: Instead of Tom, Mummy and Cherry staying on the edge of the stream, they came into the water and Tom got a piggy back on Mummy all the way. The water came over our boots and Gemma fell in and got wet. First it was deep and then it was shallow and Cherry tucked her skirt in her knickers and me and Jamie were in the lead. We collected a lot of things. We saw a kingfisher and it went round the corner of the stream. We followed the kingfisher until the water got too deep, then we went back the way we came, got out, climbed an electric fence and went home. We were very tired. Written by Tamsin Lane, aged 8.
